title: The Rebellion Of Ostia
opening: Hearing of the rebellion, Roy hurried his pace towards Ostia. According to the information he had gathered on the way, General Leygance, one of Lord Hector's advisors, had started a rebellion with Liutenant Devias to sell Ostia to Bern. Lilina had been captured and taken hostage by Leygance. She was then imprisoned inside Castle Ostia, because Leygance thought that he could use her for something later on.
Hearing that report, Roy and company entered Ostia in an effort to rescure Lilina. Ostia, the largest and most active city in Lycia, was to become a battlefield, stained with blood...

intro.speaker: Leygance
intro.line: Devias, how is the city doing?

intro.speaker: Devias
intro.line: They've been quiet so far, sir. But the mercenary knights from Ilia that Hector hired are showing no submission.

intro.speaker: Leygance
intro.line: Hmph! What's wrong with them? We're telling them we'll pay more!

intro.speaker: Devias
intro.line: Well, Ilia's mercenary knights are known never to betray their masters.

intro.speaker: Leygance
intro.line: You fool! I know that! General Narcian is going to arrive soon! If we don't have Ostia under our control by then, he'll laugh at us!

intro.speaker: Devias
intro.line: O-of course, sir.

intro.speaker: Leygance
intro.line: We may have to use Lilina to bargain with the mercenary knights... If we use her as a hostage, they should surrender to us. But that must be a last resort. We will fight them ourselves with the help of Dragon Knights sent from Bern to crush Ilia's forces!! Devias, I want you to clear out the town and guard the castle gate. I will defend the inside of our castle.

intro.speaker: Devias
intro.line: Yes sir!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Merlinus! Around how many of Ostia's troops have joined the rebellion?

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: Quite a few, I'm afraid. They have forgotten their loyalty towards Lord Hector, and are simply flocking towards the one with more power, which is Bern. How disgraceful!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: I see...

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: But there is good news too, Master Roy! There is a band of mercenary knights from Ilia that are willing to join forces with us and attack the rebels.

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: Mercenary knights from Ilia?

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: Yes. They said that they signed a contract with Lord Hector that they would fight Bern alongside Ostia's troops.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: That's fortunate. But when the mercenary knights hear the news that Lord Hector has passed away, that contract would probably be broken. Do you think it's possible for us to officially hire them into our service?

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: I would have thought so too, Master Roy. However, they already knew of Lord Hector's death. They offered to fight alongside us anyway.

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: Why do they go that far, when they are mercenaries?

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: Ilia is a snowy area with a harsh temperature so the land isn't very arable. Therefore, sending out mercenaries to fight for pay is one of Ilia's main sources of economic input. I've also heard that mercenaries from Ilia put trust over anything else and that they never betray their employers. The rumors are true, I see.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Then they should be powerful allies.

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: Yes! Fortune is still with us, Master Roy! But... I heard from the mercenary knights that one of the Three Dragon Lords is coming here with a legion of Dragon Knights. If they should join the rebels, then our chances of defeating them would become extremely slim.

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: Roy, what are you going to do?

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: ... The Kingdom of Etruria might join us.

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: Etruria?! Would that be possible?

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: General Cecilia, the Sorcery General of Etruria was my teacher in battle arts while I was studying in Ostia. I have a feeling she would be willing to join forces with us.

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: I would object, Master Roy! If we depend on Etruria to solve our own matters in Lycia, we'll be sure to be their laughing stock for decades!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Yes, I know that... But this is truly an important matter for Lycia. I think that we should go for the safest and most definite option rather than worry about the consequences and do nothing, which would most likely lead to the extinction of Lycia.

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: ... Lord Roy.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: We have to move quickly! I'll write a letter to General Cecilia. Merlinus, I need you to get the letter to her as quickly as possible.

intro.speaker: Merlinus
intro.line: ... Yes, Lord Roy! You are right. I shall send the letter to her as soon as you are ready.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Thanks. All right, everybody! Let's retake Ostia!

battle.speaker: Zelots
battle.line: It looks like the Lycia Alliance have started attacking the rebels. All right, we're going too. Let's go and drive off the rebel forces!

battle.speaker: Trec
battle.line: Will do, sir.

battle.speaker: Zelots
battle.line: Wait, where's Noah?

battle.speaker: Trec
battle.line: Ummm, I think he went to the arena a while ago. He said he's coaching a young girl in the sword arts.

battle.speaker: Zelots
battle.line: That Noah, a coach? That's unusual... Well, no matter. Once he finds out we're attacking the rebels, he'll catch up to us.

battle.speaker: Trec
battle.line: Yup.

battle.speaker: Zelots
battle.line: All right, let's go.

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: Looks like they've started attacking the rebels. Well then, Fir, I should get going soon.

battle.speaker: Fir
battle.line: Thank you for coaching me, Sir Noah.

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: No problem. But I must say you surprised me. You suddenly came up to me and said, "I want to fight a match with you!"

battle.speaker: Fir
battle.line: I-I'm sorry, Sir Noah. It was my first time in the arena...

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: If you asked another person, you would have been killed. You need to look your opponent over very carefully before choosing to fight.

battle.speaker: Fir
battle.line: And you must not hesitate to surrender if it looks like you're going to lose. Right?

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: Exactly. You can always win back your money, but if you lose your life, it's all over.

battle.speaker: Fir
battle.line: Yes!

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: What are your plans now? Are you going to stay here and work on your sword skills?

battle.speaker: Fir
battle.line: No. I'm planning to travel to the Western Isles.

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: The Western Isles? Why?

battle.speaker: Fir
battle.line: They're building a new mine there, and I heard that a lot of people are going there looking for work. They must be strong people if they're miners, so I thought it would be the ideal place to find people to fight for my training. And besides...

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: Besides?

battle.speaker: Fir
battle.line: The Western Isles is where my mother first met my father. She's dead now, but when she was my age she was also traveling around the world training her sword skills.

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: I see... You surprise me again.

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: All you were saying at first was, "I want to become strong, I want to become strong," right? So I thought swordplay was all you had interest in. But you were training because you wanted to be like your mother? I'm so happy that you do have a cute side!

battle.speaker: Fir
battle.line: What? ... Sir Noah! Please don't tease me!

battle.speaker: Noah
battle.line: Hahahaha!

battle.speaker: Devias
battle.line: The reinforcements should be arriving from the south soon. Hehe... That Lycia army'll be shocked when they get hit from behind!

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Okay, the city should be under control by now. Now we have to recapture Castle Ostia and rescue Lilina!

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Master Roy, we are currently breaking down the gate to enter the castle. I understand that you want to get in quickly, but we are working as fast as we can, so please be patient!

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Speaking of Lady Lilina... What do you think of Lord Hector's story, Master Roy?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: You mean about the Dragons? They weren't myth, they were real... Lord Hector is one of the greatest battle tacticians in Lycia. And his army was decimated in such a short time...

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Well, Bern's army is among the strongest in Elibe. I say, those Dragon Knights are indeed very formidable opponents.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Of course the Dragon Knights must have been tough enemies. But the real Dragons... I can't even imagine how powerful they must be. The weapons that are effective against Dragons... I wonder where they are?

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: I presume they must be the Divine Weapons.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: So if we use those weapons, we can fight the Dragons effectively. But I wonder what a Divine Weapon is doing in Ostia?

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Perhaps Lady Lilina knows that. Hmm, I do wish to know as well. Oh! Master Roy, our men have finished knocking down the gate. We can enter now!

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: All right! Charge! We will rescue Lilina, no matter what!

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Excuse me, sir, are you Sir Zelots of the Ilia Mercenary Knights?

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: And you are?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: My name is Roy. I'm the leader of the army that's fighting the rebels.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: You? Impressive... I was expecting somebody a little older.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: I am here, respecting the will of Lord Hector.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Lord Hector... We've lost a valuable person. He was a true warrior.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Yes, and I want to retake Ostia, for Lord Hector's sake! And Lilina's sake...

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: All right. Then we'll help you as much as we can.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Thank you for your assistance.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: You can thank me after we've retaken the castle. Come, we must concentrate on the enemy right now.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Yes!

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: You're one of the Ilian mercenaries, right?

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: Hmmm? Yeah, so what?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: My name is Roy. I lead the Lycia Alliance Army...

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: Ah, then I'm going to be under your leadership from now.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: What?? Is that okay?

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: Hm?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: You don't have to check with your commander first?

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: Ah, don't worry about that. He said we were to join with the Lycia Alliance.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: But did he really mean...

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: "Really mean" what? We're in the middle of a battle. If you take the time to check every little thing with your commander, you'll be dead. I'm not going against his orders, though.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: .. All right.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: You're one of the Ilian mercenaries, right?

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: Yeah. And what do you want?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: My name is Roy. I'm the leader of the Lycian Alliance Army.

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: Oh! I heard about you... From now on, is it all right if I join with you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Are you sure that's all right?

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: What?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Don't you have to ask your commander if it's okay..?

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: He told us to join with the Lycia Alliance Army. That's enough for me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: But did he mean like this?

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: This is a battlefield. If you take your time to check everything with your commander, then you won't be able to act quickly in trouble. It's not good to disobey orders, but outside of that you can play it by ear.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: I see... Thanks for telling me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Trec, we are going into the Lycia army's service.

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: Okay, sir.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Hm, not the most enthusiastic response. You don't like the idea?

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: Eh? No, I have no problem with it.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Oh, all right. Just thought I'd ask.

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: Lycia... Nah, we shouldn't have much trouble.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Noah!

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: Sir Zelots, I'm sorry that I'm late.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: I heard you were coaching a young girl in the sword arts.

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: Yes... She was a little naive, so I couldn't help it.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Is she not with you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: She said she was headed for the Western Isles.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: I see. Pity, I thought she might have been of some help if she were still here. But you, who ordinarily wouldn't start nosing around into other people's matters, a coach? Now that is unusual.

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: Do you think so, sir?

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Yes. Trec and I were joking around saying that you may have fancied the girl. But it is in the arena, so that probably wasn't the case.

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: General Zelots.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Trec, what is it?

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: I just met with the Lycia Alliance leader.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Ah, did you? Why didn't you tell me, then?

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: Oh, not like that. I just met with him now.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: That's fine. Then it's time for us to submit to his leadership. Trec, I leave the negotiations with the Lycian Alliance to you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Trec
recruit-talk.line: Yes sir!

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: General Zelots!

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Ah, it's Noah. You were at the arena, weren't you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: Yes, sorry I'm late.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Doesn't really matter... We've just started fighting. I haven't talked to the Lycia Alliance army yet.

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: Oh? Don't worry, I just got done talking to their leader.

recruit-talk.speaker: Zelots
recruit-talk.line: Really! Then it's time for us to submit to his leadership. Noah, I leave the negotiations with the Lycia Alliance to you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Noah
recruit-talk.line: Yes sir!

boss.speaker: Devias
boss.line: You... you beat Bern's Dragon Knights!? Ergh... I'll not let you pass here!

boss.speaker: Devias
boss.line: General Leygance... Please be careful... These people are... strong...

boss.speaker: Bors
boss.line: Causing a rebellion during Lord Hector's absence?! That is unforgivable!

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: This...? This is the Torch staff! It creates light in the foggiest places! If you're in a fog, you can't attack or see anything! It helps to have this when it works against you.

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: A while back, some unknown person was dying in the street. When I helped him, he gave me this sword. Really strange person, but nice... Hm? Here's the sword. You can have it! Just take good care of it.

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: Hey you, look at this great thing I made. It fires arrows MUCH further than a normal bow! It's very useful, right? Right. Just like I thought. I'll give it to you guys, I want it with someone that knows how to use it.

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: Are you going to help Lady Lilina? Here's something that can cure injuries from a distance! If Lady Lilina's hurt, please help her...

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: Be careful. General Leygance is allied with Bern now! He went and slaughtered all those who resisted him... But I saved my own hide. Please take this, it's proof for heroes. Give this to them, and keep fighting to protect Ostia...

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: This town used to belong to Lycia! But now, look at it... You guys are out to restore Ostia's former glory, right? Then, take this gem... If you sell it, it will catch a high price! Please, help Ostia!

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: Social Knights, Paladins, Nomads... All those guys riding on horses... This spear, the Knight Killer, is effective against them. There's a lot of horsemen in the rebel army, so use this against them!

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: Medicine! Medicine! This cures anything! No matter what kind of wounds you have, this will restore you completely! The contents are a secret, though... Can't tell you, or I'll get in trouble. Hmm? You don't want the medicine? Aww, I'll give you some for free, if you buy it next time!
